dc_title_s: 1813 Plan of 46 Building Lots Situate in the City of Trenton, NJ
dc_description_s: A hand drawn plan of 46 building lots laid out and offered for sale in August 1813 by William and Stacy Potts. The lots are on Greene, Centre and Montgomery Streets which today is the city block bounded by North Broad, Perry, Academy and North Montgomery Streets.|Most of the lots have names written on them perhaps signifying current or future owners.|Map scale is 1" = 10'.
